JOB DESCRIPTION: Software Engineer II     Analyze fraud risks and client applications (thick and thin client), conduct technical feasibility and determine product fitment     Configure business rules to automate issue detection and perform testing     Test, build and deploy software on client systems or environments     Support User Acceptance Testing and production deployment     Maintain and support applications deployed in production     Conduct product demonstrations, support pre-sales and participate in reviews     Work estimation and planning     Support in design and implementation of new product features and enhancements     Assist in developing proof of concepts     Prepare technical documentation and reports     Collaborate with internal team and external stakeholders throughout the project s lifecycle     Participate and encourage knowledge sharing     Help in defining and implementation of processes
